public class Match
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

  • Field Summary

    private boolean active
    Boolean used to maintain the match active

    Lock to safely access the content of active

    Reference to the current controller
    private boolean loadFromFile

    Returns the participants to the match, represented by their nickname and connection in order to remove the ConnectionSetupHandler from the observer of the connection of the players in the game

      Constructor of match

    • addParticipant

    • getParticipantMap

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Connection> getParticipantMap()
      Returns the participants to the match, represented by their nickname and connection in order to remove the ConnectionSetupHandler from the observer of the connection of the players in the game
      Returns:
      the participants to the match

    • run

      public void run()
      Called when the match is launched on a new thread and does all the required setup operations before launching a game
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()

    • setActive

      public void setActive​(boolean active)

    • handleReconnection

      public void handleReconnection​(java.lang.String nickname, Connection connection)
      Called by the lobby when it has to handle a reconnection to an ongoing game
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player requesting the reconnection
      connection - connection of the reconnecting player

    • handleDisconnection

      public void handleDisconnection​(User user)
      Called by the controller when handling a disconnection of a player from a game
      Parameters:
      user - user to disconnect

    • destroyEveryThing

      private void destroyEveryThing()
      Called when closing a game after it has ended or when something went wrong in the setup phase of a game. For example a player disconnected while in setup phase

    • endGameDuringSetup

      public void endGameDuringSetup()
      Notify all the players that the game is being destroyed and then calls destroyEveryThing()

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Notify all the players that the game is ended and then calls destroyEveryThing()

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile()
      Method called by the controller and it used to save the current game from file

    • setLobbyState

      public void setLobbyState​(LobbyState state)
      Used to communicate with the lobby. Used for example when the lobby has to pass from waiting for disconnected players to the creation of a new game
      Parameters:
      state - state in witch the lobby has to move

    • isLoadFromFile

      public boolean isLoadFromFile()

    • setLoadFromFile
